utils_validator.description: Provides validation utilities for model responses, including detection of anticipation and unsolicited explanations.

formatter.description: Handles prompt construction, response formatting, and validation for Anita.

utils_sanity_check.description: Provides sanity checks for model responses, including validation against prompt types and detection of unsolicited advice.

model_wrapper.description: Wrapper for Qwen model with response validation and retry logic.

parser.description: Parses model outputs to extract the last assistant reply, applying emotional modulation based on current emotional state.

introspection_input_reflection.description: Generates reflections based on user input, persona state, and sentiment analysis.

introspection_meta_response.description: Generates meta-commentary based on introspective evaluations, emotional tone, and context triggers.

evaluate_consistency.description: Evaluates the consistency and coherence of reflections through multiple analytical lenses.

introspection_evaluation_history.description: Manages logging and comparison of introspection evaluations over time.

evolution_memo.description: Generates introspective memos summarizing cognitive evolution and emotional shifts over time.

introspection_evaluation_engine.description: Runs structured introspection evaluations, logs results, compares to history, and generates meta-commentary.

introspection_self_state.description: Manages the core identity and emotional state of the system, integrating insights from introspective evaluations and evolution memos.

introspection_motivation_system.description: Manages and adjusts core motivational drives based on introspective commentary and evaluations.

introspection_coordinator.description: Coordinates the introspection cycle with dynamic trait/motivation inference and memory updates.

utils_reflection_engine.description: Manages periodic self-reflection cycles, analyzing system status and injecting insights into context.

utils_emotion_engine.description: Manages emotional state, applies emotional bias to text, and adapts profiles based on sustained moods.

motivation_system.description: Manages the system's motivational drives, adjusting curiosity, alignment, and self-consistency based on introspective evaluations and commentary.

trait_inference.description: Infers personality traits and cognitive tendencies from reflective evaluations.

motivation_engine.description: Adjusts motivational weights based on evaluation metrics to guide future reflections.

contextual_notes.description: Generates contextual summaries based on reflection evaluations to inform future introspection.

memory_bridge.description: Bridges short-term and long-term memory, managing reflection timeline snapshots.

long_term_memory.description: Manages Anita's long-term memory index for persistent reflections.
